title: Hard Scrabble: Illustrated: Between Ancient Enmities
description: ENCAPSULATION: Sent to report on the insurgency on Hard Scrabble but on no account to become involved in counterinsurgency, a Federation diplomat and her team find acquiring the information lands them right in the middle of the action. DESCRIPTION: Federation diplomat, Gloria Spencer, needs the military expertise of the crew of the navy courier ship to prepare for her assignment to investigate the insurgency on the planet Hard Scrabble. When the local Federation ambassador is kidnapped by rebels, she and the crew are ordered to get to Hard Scrabble fast to spearhead the rescue effort and ferret out the spy within embassy personnel. In the course of obtaining the information on the political instabilities, they become enmeshed in the local, shifting alliances and find themselves in the middle when war breaks out. 84,205 words. Thirty-nine black and white drawings, one or two located at the end of each chapter: pencil, pen and ink, charcoal, watercolor pencil. female protagonist, artificial intelligence, espionage, diplomacy, friendship, political, war
author: June Elliott
